title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4027.2 - Start-when considered
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4027.2 - Start-when considered

State Regulations

Every horse shall be considered as having started and
be liable for whatever is due for so doing, when its jockey has been weighed
and its number displayed, unless the stewards shall otherwise
determine. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4027.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
